Job Description: Do you have the following skillset?     Proficiency in Python 3.x    Working knowledge of constructs like Iterators, Generators, Itertools, Decorators, Descriptors, IOLoop   Proficiency in Django or Flask to develop REST compliant APIs   Can write highly performant Python code   Experience with packaging and deployment tools like Wheels and Fabric is a big plus   Can apply design principles and design patterns to your code in a practical way   Knowledge of working with ORMs like SQLAlchemy or Django ORM   Working experience in writing automated tests using unittest and nosetest   Good working experience in database modeling and can write advanced SQL Queries   Experience with a frontend web frameworklibrary like ReactJS or Angular would be a plus   Deep knowledge of troubleshooting and debugging techniques like divide & conquer, time profiling and memory profiling   Self-motivation to dig in and learn on your own   Prompt and proactive communication ability      Icing on the cake, if you     Working knowledge of HTML, CSS, jQuery and other Web technologies   Exposure with Atlassian JIRA application lifecycle management tool   Working experience with Scrum methodology   Excellent written and verbal communication skills   Exposure to various tools that help in maintaining code quality like SonarQube
